title: This morning out of nowhere my screen went green, like it has a green filter on.
content: This morning my screen randomly turned green. It was out of nowhere, I was watching YouTube and then bam, green. It will not go away, I've tried resetting my phone, I've tried turning it off, adjusting screen settings, and I've even turned to youtube and reddit. But nothing works, am I just gonna be out $800? I've had this over a year so no warranty...
